'''Northlander Claymore Billet''' is an item used in [[Forging]] 4-star [[Claymores]] from [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], and [[Inazuma]].

==Alchemy==

|Midlander Claymore Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2

}}
